de.iabg.mesh.event
Class ConnectionColorItemListener

java.lang.Object
  de.iabg.mesh.event.ConnectionColorItemListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.util.EventListener
public class ConnectionColorItemListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ItemListener

This ItemListener updates the 3D scene of the JMeshConnectionPanel whenever the node connection color changes.

Version:
September 13, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
